newsitem.title: UK: GKN, ARGE/GTK, Giat in vehicle cooperation.
newsitem.headline: GKN, ARGE/GTK, Giat in vehicle cooperation.

text.p: British engineering group GKN Plc said on Tuesday its unit GKN Defence, German consortium ARGE/GTK and France's Giat Industries had signed a letter of intent to cooperate on developing a new wheeled armoured vehicle.

GKN said GKN Defence and ARGE/GTK, a consortium of Krauss-Maffei Wertechnik GmbH and Rheinmetall Industrie AG/MAK System GmbH, would respond jointly to a a German ministry of defence tender for a personnel carrier.

Giat Industries is responding to a tender from France's ministry of defence for a wheeled, armoured infantry fighting vehicle. GKN said the two invitations to tender were based on common trinational specifications and covered an initial 200 vehicles for each country.
GKN said the companies would work together initially to determine maximum amount of common components and propose a common industrial organisation to limit development and production costs.
It said the companies planned to create a single contracting entity to carry out the contracts if their bids were accepted by Germany and France.
